page.title: 09Shops in Dyserth and Meliden
page.content: Lower Dyserth has one Cafe and Sweetshop plus a General Grocery Shop.Most of the shops are in Upper Dyserth on both sides of the B5332.There is one large Provisions shop,a Bakery,a Butcher and a Fruit and Vegetable Shop.A Pharmacy offers a dispensing service whilst a Cafe provides light snacks.A Chip Shop Caters for take away meals.There are two Hairdressers,an Off Licence and an Ironmonger and D.I.Y.Shop.The Post Office sells general stationery items.A Petshop sells food for all pets. Meliden's shops are on both sides of the A547 and there's a Chinese Take Away,a Newsagent,an Ironmonger and a Garden Supplies Centre.There are three food shops,a Foodmarket,a Bakery and Grocer and a Foodstore and Off Licence.
